name: jessie stash basket
sizes_available: one size - 14" wide x 6" deep x 7" tall
notes:
***get yourself organized with the practical and cozy jessie stash basket.*** these large rectangular baskets are made by holding two strands of super bulky yarn together with a 9mm hook. alternate the waistcoat stitch and single crochet in the back loop for an unexpectedly beautiful texture. bet you can't make just one! 

find the free version of the jessie stash basket [here][1]. 

pattern includes a full tutorial video.

**materials**
-395 yards wool/acrylic blend (4 balls of lion brand wool-ease thick & quick)
-9mm crochet hook
-scissors
-tapestry needle
-locking stitch markers

**techniques**
-working into both sides of a chain
-single crochet increasing
-waistcoat stitch
-back loop stitching

**measurements**
one size - 14" wide x 6" deep x 7" tall
